ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Assetbundle
ObjectStates.XmlUI:
<Defaults>
	<Panel
		scale    = "0.6 0.6 0.6"
		width    = "640"
		height   = "640"
		position = "0 0 -1"
		/>

	<Text
		fontSize = "24"
		color    = "#cccccc"
		/>
	<Button
		tooltipPosition = "Above"
		fontStyle       = "Bold"
		fontSize        = "36"
		colors          = "#eeeeee|#006980|#005264|#333333"
		textColors          = "#333333|#dddddd|#eeeeee|#666666"
		/>

	<ToggleButton
		fontSize                  = "12"
		fontStyle                 = "Bold"
		selectedBackgroundColor   = "#cccccc"
		deselectedBackgroundColor = "#333333"
		/>
	<InputField 
		class         = "single"
		fontSize      = "32"
		caretWidth    = "3"
		caretColor    = "#2222cc"
		textColor     = "#eeeeee"
		color         = "rgba(0,0,0,0.1)"
		textAlignment = "MiddleCenter"
		/>
	<InputField
		class         = "multiline"
		fontSize      = "18"
		caretWidth    = "3"
		caretColor    = "#2222cc"
		textColor     = "#eeeeee"
		lineType      = "MultiLineNewLine"
		textAlignment = "MiddleCenter"
		color         = "rgba(0.6,0.6,0.6,0.1)"
		/>
	<Slider
		fillColor       = "#5BC0EB"
		handleColor     = "#19647E"
		backgroundColor = "#506076"
		onValueChanged  = "xml_sliderChanged"
		padding   = "30 30 30 30"
		/>

	<TableLayout
		cellBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,0,0)"
		/>
	<Row
		preferredHeight = "44" 
		/>
	<Row
		class           = "top"
		preferredHeight = "64" 
		/>
		<Button
			class           = "spawn_dice"
			fontSize        = "20"
			onClick         = "btn_spawnDice"
			/>
	<Row
		class           = "small"
		preferredHeight = "22"
		/>
	<Row
		class           = "x-small"
		preferredHeight = "12"
		/>
		
	<Cell
		columnSpan    = "5"
		/>
		<Text
			class     = "@Cell>@Text"
			fontSize  = "20"
			alignment = "MiddleRight"
			/>
	<Cell
		class      = "single"
		columnSpan = "1"
		/>
		<Text
			class     = "single>@Text"
			alignment = "MiddleCenter"
			/>
</Defaults>

<Panel>
	<TableLayout>
		<Row class="top">
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<Button class="spawn_dice" tooltip="Spawn a D4 with the current settings. Left-click for plastic, right for metallic." id="Die_4">D4</Button>
			</Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<Button class="spawn_dice" tooltip="Spawn a D6 with the current settings. Left-click for plastic, right for metallic." id="Die_6">D6</Button>
			</Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<Button class="spawn_dice" tooltip="Spawn a D8 with the current settings. Left-click for plastic, right for metallic." id="Die_8">D8</Button>
			</Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<Button class="spawn_dice" tooltip="Spawn a D10 with the current settings. Left-click for plastic, right for metallic." id="Die_10">D10</Button>
			</Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<Button class="spawn_dice" tooltip="Spawn a D12 with the current settings. Left-click for plastic, right for metallic." id="Die_12">D12</Button>
			</Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<Button class="spawn_dice" tooltip="Spawn a D20 with the current settings. Left-click for plastic, right for metallic." id="Die_20">D20</Button>
			</Cell>
		</Row>

		<Row class="x-small">
			<Cell color="Grey" columnSpan="12"></Cell>
		</Row>

		<Row class="top">
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<Button 
					onClick       = "btn_targetObject"
					tooltip       = "Target the currently selected object"
					fontSize      = "52"
					textAlignment = "UpperCenter">
					âŠ•
				</Button>
			</Cell>
			<Cell>
				<InputField
					id          = "xml_obj_guid"
					class       = "single"
					text        = "no guid"
					onEndEdit   = "xml_updateGUID"
					placeholder = "Enter GUID"
					/>
			</Cell>
			<Cell>
				<Button 
					onClick = "btn_addCode"
					tooltip = "Copy the Dice Roll Display code to the targetted dice"
					fontSize      = "22">
					ADD TO DICE
				</Button>
			</Cell>
		</Row>

		<Row class="small">
			<Cell color="Grey" columnSpan="6"></Cell>
		</Row>

		<Row preferredHeight="100">
			<Cell color="Grey" columnSpan="2"></Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="9">
				<InputField
					class      = "multiline"
					text       = "Either spawn a new dice by using the D buttons, or Edit an existing dice by targetting it
or dropping it on the card. Choose the settings you want below then click 'Add to Dice' to apply them."
					interactable = "false" />
			</Cell>
		</Row>

		<Row class="small">
			<Cell color="Grey" columnSpan="12"></Cell>
		</Row>
		
		<Row>
			<Cell color="Grey" columnSpan="2"></Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="1">
				<Button 
					id      = "log_chat"
					onClick = "xml_resetValues"
					tooltip = "Reset all settings to their default values">
					R
				</Button>
			</Cell>	
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<ToggleButton 
					id             = "log_chat"
					onValueChanged = "xml_toggleChanged"
					tooltip        = "Log dice rolls to the in-game chat">
					LOG TO CHAT
				</ToggleButton>
			</Cell>			
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<ToggleButton 
					id             = "flash_max"
					onValueChanged = "xml_toggleChanged"
					tooltip        = "Flash the dice and popup with random colors when the maximum value is rolled">
					FLASH ON CRIT
				</ToggleButton>
			</Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<ToggleButton 
					id             = "sound_max"
					onValueChanged = "xml_toggleChanged"
					tooltip        = "Make a sound when the dice rolls its maximum value">
					SOUND ON CRIT
				</ToggleButton>
			</Cell>
			<Cell columnSpan="2">
				<ToggleButton 
					id             = "sound_min"
					onValueChanged = "xml_toggleChanged"
					tooltip        = "Make a sound when the dice rolls a 1">
					SOUND ON FAIL
				</ToggleButton>
			</Cell>
		</Row>
		
		<Row class="small">
			<Cell columnSpan="6"></Cell>
		</Row>

		<Row>
			<Cell><Text>Lifespan (seconds)</Text></Cell>
			<Cell class="single"></Cell>
			<Cell>
				<Slider
					id           = "lifespan"
					wholeNumbers = "true"
					minValue     = "1"
					maxValue     = "10"
					value        = "3"
					tooltip      = "Control the lifespan of the popup text"> </Slider>
			</Cell>
			<Cell class="single"><Text id = "label_lifespan" text=""></Text></Cell>
		</Row>
		<Row>
			<Cell><Text>Spin speed  </Text></Cell>
			<Cell class="single"></Cell>
			<Cell>
				<Slider
					id           = "spin_speed"
					wholeNumbers = "true"
					minValue     = "0"
					maxValue     = "10"
					value        = "2"
					tooltip      = "Adjust the speed the score rotates at"></Slider>
			</Cell>
			<Cell class="single"><Text id = "label_spin_speed" text=""></Text></Cell>
		</Row>
		<Row>
			<Cell><Text>Rise speed  </Text>  </Cell>
			<Cell class="single"></Cell>
			<Cell>
				<Slider
					id           = "rise_speed"
					wholeNumbers = "true"
					minValue     = "0"
					maxValue     = "10"
					value        = "2"
					tooltip      = "Adjust the speed at which to tooltip rises into the air"></Slider>
			</Cell>
			<Cell class="single"><Text id = "label_rise_speed" text=""></Text></Cell>
		</Row>
		<Row>
			<Cell><Text>Grow speed  </Text></Cell>
			<Cell class="single"></Cell>
			<Cell>
				<Slider
					id           = "grow_speed"
					wholeNumbers = "true"
					minValue     = "0"
					maxValue     = "10"
					value        = "2"
					tooltip      = "Adjust the growth rate of the text"></Slider>
			</Cell>
			<Cell class="single"><Text id = "label_grow_speed" text=""></Text></Cell>
		</Row>
		<Row>
			<Cell><Text>Start size  </Text></Cell>
			<Cell class="single"></Cell>
			<Cell>
				<Slider
					id           = "font_size"
					maxValue     = "10"
					minValue     = "1"
					tooltip      = "Adjust the speed at which to tooltip rises into the air"></Slider>
					value        = "2"
					wholeNumbers = "true"
			</Cell>
			<Cell class="single"><Text id = "label_font_size" text=""></Text></Cell>
		</Row>
	</TableLayout>
</Panel>
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--
--basic events
--
function onLoad(save_data)
	data = {
		target,
	}
	settings = {
		color = {
			success  = "Green",
			info     = "Blue",
			error    = "Red",
			disabled = "rgb(0.4, 0.4, 0.4)",
			enabled  = "rgb(0.9, 0.9, 0.9)",
		},
		dice = getDefaultValues(),
		lang = {
			no_target      = "No object selected! Select (highlight) an object first",
			no_obj         = "No object selected! Select (highlight) an object first and click the Target button, or drop a dice on the card",
			no_dice        = "This is not a dice. Please target a dice.",
			no_guid        = "Please enter a valid GUID or target an object first",
			no_object      = "No object found! Possibly it was removed?",
			obj_targetted  = function(o) return "Target set to object : " ..(o.getName() or "(no name)").." ("..o.guid..")" end,
			obj_code_added = "The code has been added to the dice"
		}
	}
	if save_data then
		local json = JSON.decode(save_data)
		if json and json.dice then
			settings.dice = json.dice
		end
	end
	Wait.frames(updateXml, 10)
end

function onSave()
	return JSON.encode({dice=settings.dice})
end

function onCollisionEnter(i)
	local o = i.collision_object
	if not o.guid or o.guid == "" then return false end
	assignTarget(o)
end


--
-- spawn dice
--
function btn_spawnDice(player, value, id)
	spawnObject({
        type              = id,
        position          = self.getPosition() + self.getTransformRight()*5,
        sound             = false,
        snap_to_grid      = false,
		callback_function = function(obj)
			if tonumber(value) < -1 then --if the player has right-clicked then spawn a metallic dice
				local json = JSON.decode(obj.getJSON()) 
				json.MaterialIndex = 1
				obj.destruct()
				spawnObjectJSON({
					json = JSON.encode(json),
					callback_function = function(new_obj)
						assignTarget(new_obj, player.color) 
						btn_addCode(player)
					end
				})
			else
				obj.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(player.color))
				assignTarget(obj, player.color) 
				btn_addCode(player)
			end
		end
    })
end


--
--xml ui management
--

function updateXml()
	local guid = data.target or "no guid"
	self.UI.setAttribute("xml_obj_guid", "text", guid)
	for k,v in pairs(settings.dice) do
		if type(v)=="boolean" then
			self.UI.setAttribute(k, "isOn", tostring(v))
		else
			self.UI.setAttribute(k, "value", v)
			self.UI.setValue("label_"..k, v)
		end
	end
end

function xml_sliderChanged(player, value, id)
	local v = math.round(value)
	settings.dice[id] = v
	Wait.frames(updateXml, 1)
end
function xml_toggleChanged(player, value, id)
	settings.dice[id] = (value=="True")
	log("Toggle set to "..tostring(value=="True"))
	Wait.frames(updateXml, 1)
end
function xml_resetValues()
	settings.dice = getDefaultValues()
	Wait.frames(updateXml, 1)
end

function assignTarget(obj, color)
	data.target = obj.guid
	self.UI.setAttribute("xml_obj_guid", "text", obj.guid)
	flashObj(obj)
	Wait.frames(updateXml, 1)
	if color then broadcastToColor(settings.lang.obj_targetted(obj), color, settings.color.info) end
end


--
--xml ui triggers
--
function btn_targetObject(player, value, id)
	local objs = player.getSelectedObjects()
	if #objs > 0 and objs[1] then
		if objs[1].tag == "Dice" or objs[1].tag == "Custom_Dice" then 
			assignTarget(objs[1], player.color)
		else
			data.target = nil
			broadcastToColor(settings.lang.no_dice, player.color, settings.color.error)
		end
	else
		broadcastToColor(settings.lang.no_target, player.color, settings.color.error)
	end
end

function btn_addCode(player, value, id)
	--check target object exists/valid guid
	if not data.target then
		broadcastToColor(settings.lang.no_obj, player.color, settings.color.error)
		return false 
	end
	local obj = getObjectFromGUID(data.target)
	obj.setLuaScript(getLua())
	obj.reload()
	broadcastToColor(settings.lang.obj_code_added, player.color, settings.color.success)
	Wait.frames(function()
		flashObj(getObjectFromGUID(data.target))
	end, 1)
end

function getDefaultValues()
	local t = {
		lifespan     = 3,
		spin_speed   = 3,
		rise_speed   = 3,
		grow_speed   = 3,
		font_size    = 3,
		flash_max    = true,
		sound_max    = false,
		sound_min    = false,
		log_chat     = true,
	}
	return t
end

function getLua()
	local lua = [[
function onLoad()
	lifespan     = ]]..settings.dice.lifespan..[[ 
	spin_speed   = ]]..settings.dice.spin_speed..[[ 
	rise_speed   = ]]..settings.dice.rise_speed..[[ 
	grow_speed   = ]]..settings.dice.grow_speed..[[ 
	font_size    = ]]..settings.dice.font_size..[[ 
	flash_max    = ]]..tostring(settings.dice.flash_max)..[[ 
	sound_max    = ]]..tostring(settings.dice.sound_max)..[[ 
	sound_min    = ]]..tostring(settings.dice.sound_min)..[[ 
	log_chat     = ]]..tostring(settings.dice.log_chat)..[[ 
	parent_guid  = "]]..self.guid..[[" 
	roll_active  = false
	rv = self.getRotationValues() or false
end
function onDrop(a)trigger(a)end;function onRandomize(a)trigger(a)end;function trigger(a)if roll_active then return false end;roll_active=true;Wait.condition(function()roll_active=false;local b=self.getRotationValue()or false;if not b or not rv then log("Dice "..self.guid.." does not have a valid rotation value set! Unable to show roll value.")return false end;local c=self.getPosition()+Vector({0,1+font_size/5,0})local d=spawnObject({type="3DText",position=c,sound=true})d.TextTool.setValue(tostring(b))d.TextTool.setFontColor(self.getColorTint())d.TextTool.setFontSize(font_size*24)Wait.frames(function()d.interactable=false;d.auto_raise=false;rise(d,c)spin(d,{0,spin_speed*18,0})grow(d,font_size*24)log("Score is "..b)if log_chat then local e=a;if self.getName()and self.getName()~=""then e=e.." | "..self.getName()end;printToAll("["..e.."] "..Player[a].steam_name.." rolled a "..b,a)end;if(sound_max or flash_max)and b==rv[#rv].value then if flash_max then flash(self)flash(d)end;if sound_max and getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid)then getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid).AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)end end;if b==1 and sound_min and getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid)then getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid).AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(1)end;Wait.time(function()d.destruct()end,lifespan)end,1)end,function()return self.resting end,30,function()log("Timeout exceeded waiting for dice to come to a stop")roll_active=false end)end;function rise(d,c)if not getObjectFromGUID(d.guid)then return false end;d.setPosition(c)c[2]=c[2]+rise_speed/100;Wait.frames(function()rise(d,c)end,1)end;function spin(d,f)if not getObjectFromGUID(d.guid)then return false end;d.setRotationSmooth(f,false,true)f[2]=f[2]+spin_speed*5;Wait.time(function()spin(d,f)end,0.5)end;function grow(d,font_size)if not getObjectFromGUID(d.guid)then return false end;d.TextTool.setFontSize(font_size)Wait.time(function()grow(d,font_size*(grow_speed+100)/100)end,0.1)end;function flash(d,g)if not getObjectFromGUID(d.guid)or g and g>20 then return false end;local a=g or 1;local h=self.getColorTint()if a%2==0 then h=randomColor()end;if d.tag=="3D Text"then d.TextTool.setFontColor(h)else d.highlightOn(h,0.1)end;Wait.time(function()flash(d,a+1)end,0.2)end;function randomColor()local i=math.random;return{i(255)/255,i(255)/255,i(255)/255}end
]]
	return lua
end

--
--utility functions
--
function randomColor()
	local r = math.random
	return {r(255)/255, r(255)/255,	r(255)/255}
end
function flashObj(obj, c, d)
	if not obj or not obj.guid then return false end
	local g = obj.guid
	local c = c or 4
	local d = d or 0.15
	local function flash()
		if not getObjectFromGUID(g) then return false end
		getObjectFromGUID(g).highlightOn(randomColor(), d)
	end
	for i=0,c-1 do
		Wait.time(flash, i*(d*2))
	end
end

function math.round(n, d)
	local m = 10^(d or 1)
	return math.floor(n * m + 0.5) / m
end

ObjectStates.Name: Die_6_Rounded
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
	lifespan     = 3			
	spin_speed   = 3			
	rise_speed   = 3
	grow_speed   = 3
	font_size    = 3
	flash_max    = true
	sound_max    = true
	sound_min    = false
	log_chat     = true
	parent_guid  = "card01"
	roll_active  = false
	rv = self.getRotationValues() or false
end
function onDrop(c) trigger(c) end
function onRandomize(c) trigger(c) end

function trigger(c)
	if roll_active then return false end
	roll_active = true
	Wait.condition(function()
		roll_active = false
		local s = self.getRotationValue() or false
		if not s or not rv then 
			log("Dice "..self.guid.." does not have a valid rotation value set! Unable to show roll value.")
			return false
		end
		local pos    = self.getPosition() + Vector({0, 1+(font_size/5), 0})
		local obj    = spawnObject({
			type     = "3DText",
			position = pos,
			sound    = true,
		})
		obj.TextTool.setValue(tostring(s))
		obj.TextTool.setFontColor(self.getColorTint())
		obj.TextTool.setFontSize(font_size*24)
		Wait.frames(function()
			obj.interactable = false
			obj.auto_raise   = false

			rise(obj, pos)
			spin(obj, {0,spin_speed*18,0})
			grow(obj, font_size*24)
			log("Score is "..s)
			if log_chat then
				local name = c
				if self.getName() and self.getName() ~= "" then
					name = name.." | "..self.getName()
				end
				printToAll("["..name.."] "..Player[c].steam_name.." rolled a "..s, c)
			end
			if (sound_max or flash_max) and s==rv[#rv].value then
				if flash_max then
					flash(self)
					flash(obj)
				end
				if sound_max and getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid) then
					getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid).AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
				end
			end
			if s == 1 and sound_min and getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid) then
				getObjectFromGUID(parent_guid).AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(1)
			end
			Wait.time(function()
				obj.destruct()
			end, lifespan)
		end, 1)
	end, 
	function() return self.resting end, 
	30,
	function()
		log("Timeout exceeded waiting for dice to come to a stop")
		roll_active = false
	end)
end

function rise(obj, pos)
	if not getObjectFromGUID(obj.guid) then return false end
	obj.setPosition(pos)
	pos[2] = pos[2] + (rise_speed/100)
	Wait.frames(function() rise(obj, pos) end, 1)
end

function spin(obj, rot)
	if not getObjectFromGUID(obj.guid) then return false end
	obj.setRotationSmooth(rot, false, true)
	rot[2] = rot[2] + spin_speed*5
	Wait.time(function() spin(obj, rot) end, 0.5)
end	

function grow(obj, font_size)
	if not getObjectFromGUID(obj.guid) then return false end
	obj.TextTool.setFontSize(font_size)
	Wait.time(function() grow(obj, font_size*((grow_speed+100)/100)) end, 0.1)
end

function flash(obj, i)
	if not getObjectFromGUID(obj.guid) or (i and i > 20) then return false end
	local c = i or 1
	local col = self.getColorTint()
	if c % 2 == 0 then
		col = randomColor()
	end
	if obj.tag == "3D Text" then
		obj.TextTool.setFontColor(col)
	else
		obj.highlightOn(col, 0.1)
	end
	Wait.time(function() flash(obj, c+1) end, 0.2)
end

function randomColor()
	local r = math.random
	return {r(255)/255, r(255)/255,	r(255)/255}
end
